title: SmartBrain Face Detection
summary: This simple web app uses the Clarifai API to recognize faces in an image. The app also demonstrates user authentication and authorization.

title: Nonprofit Web Design
summary: For this client project, a team of myself and two other students recommended a site redesign for the World Affairs Council of Pittsburgh. We developed user journeys and personas, benchmarked against peer organizations, and carried out usability tests. With these insights, we developed wireframes and a high-fidelity prototype for a redesigned and re-organized site, better conveying the mission of the organization and supporting the goals of the users.
